https://tmrev.io/movie/682523-An Open Window 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/omVdQVd8Iwk7Hww27fbohYprbh6.jpg Can madness be described? Is it possible to express the pain that it entails? In 1994, when she was about to fall prey to her illness, Khady Sylla met Aminta Ngom, who exhibited her madness freely, without fear of provocation. During her years of suffering, Aminta was her window to the world. An Open Window
